Subject: Heritrix and Umbra Setup
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=579808846
From: "Dooley, Chase" <cdool@...>

Hello! 

I'm working on setting up Umbra with Heritrix for our in-house cra=
wling efforts, and am having some difficulties. From the RabbitMQ Web inter=
face, I see that connections and channels are being made; however, nothing =
is passed to the queue. I'm just wondering if this is the correct behavior.=


Here are the portions of the crawler beans that concern Umbra:

https://g=
ist.github.com/chasehd/b7fc2c27c9f33266c1241cedbf69415d 

I used Andy Jacks=
on's example (https://gist.github.com/anjackson/ce84c8aa61e6fa439e79) as re=
ference, and so that excerpt is found at the top level of the crawler beans=
 where the other Fetch Chains are defined; it's referenced, then, under the=
 fetchProcessors bean.

Thanks for your help!

Best,
Chase
